entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:56 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
